about.content: We are a company offering modern technology solutions focused on innovation and efficiency.
about.title: About NovaTech
about.subtitle: Who we are and how we work.
about.p1: NovaTech Consulting is a technology and design partner helping organizations build digital products that are intuitive, scalable, and reliable.
about.p2: We bring together senior engineers, product thinkers, and designers to turn complex problems into simple, elegant solutions.
about.p3: Our mission is to empower teams with technology that truly works for people, while our vision is to become the go-to partner for mission-critical digital initiatives worldwide.

values.v1: Human-centered design over technology for its own sake.
